definitions: (with reference to public transport) continuing or valid to the final destination.
(of traffic) passing from one side of a place to another in the course of a longer journey.
(of a road) open at both ends, allowing free passage from one end to the other.
(of a room) running the whole length of a building.
(of a team or competitor) having successfully passed to the next stage of a competition.
Having no prospect of any future relationship, dealings, or success.
